description: It is a hot day is So. California. Austin Merrick and Bradley Hudson are in search of some waves. Unfortunately there were just ripples. Bradley decided to go anyway. Austin was a rebel, checked the surf report and brought his skateboard. After catching a few small waves these restless souls decided to something more fun and go home to play with each others dicks. As soon as they get home they jump on the couch and start passionately making out. The board shorts are ripped off and their hands are vigorously rubbing up and down each others bodies until Bradley's long dick ends up in Austin's mouth. You will have to wait and see what happens next......
title: Austin Merrick Rides Bradley Hudson, Scene #01
